start.1: cd ../repo && npm i && node fileToRun && echo 'server start good'
cd ../repo && python fileToRun.py && echo 'server start good'

compile.1: cd ../repo && javac fileToRun.java && echo 'server compile good'

start.1: cd ../repo && java fileToRun.java && echo 'server start good'

compile.1: cd ../repo && g++ fileToRun.cpp -o fileToRun.exe && echo 'server compile good'
